helpText:
üìñ Help & FAQ

How to book an appointment:
1. Select 'My Bookings'
2. Choose 'Book New Appointment'
3. Select a service
4. Choose a time slot
5. Enter your details

How to reschedule:
1. Select 'My Bookings'
2. Choose 'Reschedule'
3. Enter your email
4. Select the appointment
5. Choose a new time slot

How to cancel:
1. Select 'My Bookings'
2. Choose 'Cancel'
3. Enter your email
4. Select the appointment to cancel
